course.subject: ISOM
course.name: FinTech and Big Data Financial Analytics
course.description: Recent technology innovations have reshaped the finance industry, leading to new way of how financial information is disseminated, processed and analyzed. Topics to be covered will include: artificial intelligence in financial analytics, big data alpha models, algorithm trading and high frequency trading, social trading, robo-advisor, P2P lending, cryptocurrency and blockchain.
course.exclusions: ISOM 5330, CSIT 5920
